Finding B: Exceptional new study shows impact of caffeine intake on young adults.

Finding A: At first, the birds didn\'t flee from the unfamiliar sounds.
Finding B: We anticipate that the availability of our BioBits™ kits and the data reported here will encourage teaching and broaden participation in the field of synthetic biology.
Finding C: Contrary to common hypotheses, they found that the most likely origin of migration in this group lay in ancestral species that resided in North America and gradually moved further and further south for the winter.

Finding A: Innovative approach improves #aptamer efficacy in #cancer treatment- hybridize photo-labile oligonucleotide @username
Finding B: However, as soon as the ciliates were also allowed to evolve, protection came at a high cost to the bacteria: they then only produced few offspring.
Finding C: Accounting for these delayed emissions, the net sink for carbon (declining emissions and declining rates of forest re-growth) was greatest immediately after harvests ceased and declined as regrowing forests aged.
Finding D: At a continental scale, we show biogeographic barriers to gene flow associated with the Brisbane Valley and Clarence River, as identified by mtDNA studies , and find a barrier associated with the Hunter Valley, which was not previously known in koalas (Fig.
